meanings.definition: A person who takes part in an undertaking with another or others.
meanings.sent1: My friends and I are partners in our school project.
meanings.sent2: The business partners worked together to launch their startup.
meanings.sent3: The partners in crime planned a silly prank on their neighbors.
meanings.sent4: Their partnership was like a well-oiled machine, each partner complementing the other.
meanings.sent5: The partners in the dance competition moved in perfect harmony.

meanings.sent1: She is one of the partners in the law firm.
meanings.sent2: The partners gathered for a meeting to discuss the company's future.
meanings.sent3: The partners at the accounting firm celebrated a successful tax season.
meanings.sent4: Being a partner in the business required dedication and hard work.
meanings.sent5: The partners in the restaurant shared the workload to ensure success.

meanings.sent1: They have been partners in life for over 50 years.
meanings.sent2: The couple enjoyed a romantic dinner as partners in love.
meanings.sent3: The partners in the romantic comedy movie had great on-screen chemistry.
meanings.sent4: She knew he was the perfect partner for her from the moment they met.
meanings.sent5: The partners danced under the stars, lost in each other's eyes.
